website_summaries.verdict: If you're a small business that needs to frequently bind short reports, this is a good choice.
pros: Fits longer paper lengths of 14 inches or more due to open sides
Uses metal wire to bind, which can be more durable
Produces professional-looking booklets with clean holes
cons: Limited to booklets of about 120 pages of 20-pound paper, less if paper is thicker

customer_reviews.title: A bomber wire binder
customer_reviews.text: There are lots of cheap options out there, but this is worth the money if you bind often or in a hurry. The handles are long so there's lots of leverage. The punching is clean and easy for lots of sheets. The only improvement would be using a toothed binding holder for sliding the sheets onto the wire. The spring clamp down doesn't hold the binding in precision so you need to carefully get the first sheets started. Other high end binders by Akiles have a toothed binder holder that keeps them in perfect alignment.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Solid machine for the press clamp binding systems.
customer_reviews.text: The hole inset knob really seems to have only two settings even though it shows four. So it punches deep in the page or close to the edge but nothing between the two.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis F. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Fun tool!
customer_reviews.text: Overall great. The closure part too some trial and error on my part. But I think I have it figured out now. I love binding things now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy now for us to produce professional proposals in house ...
customer_reviews.text: This machine will last a life time. So easy now for us to produce professional proposals in house with out the added expense of travel of shiping. Worth the price. It is a VERY heavy machine.
customer_reviews.author: Office Gal

customer_reviews.title: This machine is great for our small business
customer_reviews.text: This machine is great for our small business. We use them for our price books. The only downfall is- once the wire is on, there is no way to take it off and reuse it without it becoming bent (unlike the plastic spines)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heavy unit. should last well. Works well on the calendars I have put together.
customer_reviews.author: MountainHigh

customer_reviews.title: My first review
customer_reviews.text: First review I have ever written. Great product, very stable design. We'll worth the money. The only binders I could fine locally are comb binders and the twin binders are much nicer looking products in the end. I get very professional looking end products now.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton  Brill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for a small/medium office. Sturdy design and simple operation.
customer_reviews.author: B. Araki

customer_reviews.title: and I just love it! Solid build
customer_reviews.text: I got mine @ MyBinding.com, and I just love it! Solid build, I cannot image it ever breaking. Small enough to sit on a shelf and very easy to use... for making less than 50 catalogs or so, it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E. Thurston

customer_reviews.title: Makes really classy looking reports!
customer_reviews.text: Our office really likes this machine. It saves a ton of time and money since we don't need to run to Kinkos to have the same jobs done anymore. We won a couple of big contracts with the super clean and professional looking reports. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

product_meta.title: Akiles WireMac-31 Model AWM31 Wire Punch & Binding Equipment, 3:1 Pitch, All 40 Disengaging Dies, Square (0.157″ x 0.157″) Hole Punch, Heavy-Duty, 20 sheets single punching capacity (20 lbs paper)
product_meta.description:
Akiles WireMac-31 Model AWM31 Wire Punch & Binding Equipment, 3:1 Pitch, All 40 Disengaging Dies, Square (0.157″ x 0.157″) Hole Punch, Heavy-Duty, 20 sheets single punching capacity (20 lbs paper) 

Akiles WireMac renders efficiency and productivity. Its full range of functions and state of the art mechanisms were especially designed with one goal in mind: to fully meet the needs of the wire binding industry!


Key Features
 * Heavy-Duty
 * 20 sheets single punching capacity (20 lbs paper)
 * 14″ width punching capacity with open sides for even wider documents
 * All dies can be independently disengaged, to allow the punching of any size document while preventing partial side-end perforation
 * Closing capacity: From 3/16″ to 9/16″
 * All metal construction


Specifications
 * Pitch: 3:1
 * Punching Length: 14″ (40 dies)
 * Disengaging Dies: All 40
 * Hole Punch: Square (0.157″ x 0.157″)
 * Binding Thickness: From 3/16″ to 9/16″
 * Single Punching Capacity: Up to 20 sheets (20 lbs)
 * Closer Selector: Included
 * Closing Mechanism: Vertical
 * Master Selector: Included
 * Metal Wire Snatch: Included
 * Wire Diameter Scale: Included
 * Side Margins Control: Included
 * Punching Margin Control:Included
 * Weight/Volumn: 45 lbs/2.55 CbFt
feature_bullets: 20 sheets single punching capacity (20 lbs paper)
14″ width punching capacity with open sides for even wider documents
All dies can be independently disengaged, to allow the punching of any size document while preventing partial side-end perforation
